refnamediv.refpurpose: Euclidean morphological dilation of binary images

varlistentry.listitem: M x N Binary image to be dilated. (0 for background, 1 for object)
of circular Euclidean structuring element to be used. Defaults to 5.

determines the size of Dil. It assumes be one of the following values:
'same'
Dil has the same size as the original image, M x N. The image is assumed to be 0 outside its bounds.
'full'
Dil contains the full dilation, (M+2*radius-1) x (N+2*radius-1). The image is assumed to be 0 outside its bounds.

the method to be used:
'cuisenaire pmn'
a fast exact linear-time algorithm (default)
'costa-estrozi' or 'exact dilations'
a direct exact dilations algorithm

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function edilate performs exact euclidean dilation of a binary image Img using a circle as the structuring element. It is implemented in C with state-of-the-art algorithms, optimized for speed.
